title: Warming Spicy Apple Halloween Smoothie
directions: Blend the dry ingredients and liquid first for a short time
Blend the greens next for a short time (if using)
Blend the fruit and the rest of the ingredients until smooth
ingredients: ¼ Cup Dried Coconut or Coconut Butter/ Creamed Coconut or Coconut Milk
½ Cup Dates (or use your own healthy sweetener to taste)
½ Teaspoon fresh or powdered Ginger
1/4 Teaspoon Cayenne Pepper or to taste
1 Teaspoon of Vanilla extract (or to taste)
